meanings.definition: Bachelor of Science in Industrial Education (産業教育学理学士)
meanings.english_definition: An undergraduate academic degree focusing on industrial arts and vocational education.

examples.sentence: He earned his BSIndEd from the University of Technical Education.
examples.translation: 彼は技術教育大学で産業教育学理学士号を取得した

etymology.value: 略語: Bachelor of Science (理学士) + Industrial (産業) + Education (教育)

usage_notes.explanation: 主にフィリピンなどの教育機関で使われる学位名。産業技術教育や職業訓練指導者養成を目的とした課程。

similar_degrees: BSIE (Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineering)
